thread.title: Justin Bieber Previews New Song and Its Choreography in New Instagram Clip
thread.title_full: Justin Bieber Previews New Song and Its Choreography in New Instagram Clip

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Justin Bieber Previews New Song and Its Choreography in New Instagram Clip
text:
Comments In the video, the Canadian singer performs some choreographed moves while a very short snippet of the track is played in the background. 
Justin Bieber keeps building the anticipation of his " Purpose ", most recently by sharing a preview of what looks like a new song off the album. The Canadian heartthrob posted on Instagram Sunday, October 11 a video featuring a very brief snippet of the track. In the video, Bieber is seen going shirtless as he busts out some moves alongside choreographer Nick Demoura while the track is played in the background. "It it too late to say I'm sorry now? @nickdemoura," the 21-year-old superstar wrote in the caption. A video posted by Justin Bieber (@justinbieber) on Oct 11, 2015 at 1:58pm PDT There's still no word on what the title of the song or if it's really a cut off "Purpose", which is due out on November 13. The album has so far been preceded by "What Do You Mean?" that debuted at No. 1 on Billboard Hot 100 upon its release in late August. A few days ago, Bieber teased his new LP with its sexy cover art . The singer is featured shirtless while facing down in the artwork created by Los Angeles street artist Retna.
